root.name: Rhythm de Cooking: Sweets Party e Youkoso
root.description: IntroductionRythm de Cooking is the successor to the 2007 (?) better known in English speaking territories as Imagine Master Chef.GameplayRhythm de cooking's game play could be described as a best of mix of other popular rhythm games like Taiko and Step Mania. The game play used to play the songs will change several times mid song switching from drum Taiko game play to the 4 arrow Step mania game play. The different types of game play are:Taiko: "dots" come travel from the right to the left and once the dot crosses the "beat line" on the left side of the screen you will have to press the drum on the touch screen. You either touch the drum on its centre or on its outside. Step Mania: 4 different arrows (left, right, down and up) travel from the left to the right, once one of these arrows hits the beat line you'll have to press that direction on the D-pad or on the touch screen. (?) When you complete a song you will be rewarded accessories with which you can dress up your character and ingredients.ModesStory mode:Quick play Mode: Replay the different songs you unlocked in story mode.Collection modesRecipe book: Look up the different recipes you played through in story mode to make them Dress up: Here you can put on the different clothes and haircuts you unlocked for your character. There are 40 different haircuts and 30 different dresses to unlock Ingredient mode: check out the different ingredients you unlocked. Music mode: listen to the different songs of the game while the main character dances on them Song ListAnimePreCure 5, Full Throttle Go Go! （Yes!
